segments.text: So Vicky , how long have you held your present position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve been a secretary for two years , before that I was at university .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And how do you like working for IBM ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s challenging , I feel I have learned a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ’ s strength do you bring to the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I get along well with people , and I enjoy working with others .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s good . We always need team players here .
segments.speaker: S1
